summary: Cash-only transactions require a price input
why_it_hurts: Deposits and dividends cannot be recorded because the form blocks submission without a price.

summary: README promises an import workflow that the UI lacks
why_it_hurts: Advisors and quants follow documentation into a dead end, preventing bulk ingestion of transactions.

summary: Portfolio Controls surfaces raw HTTP errors
why_it_hurts: Front-line staff see opaque transport errors (e.g., 403) which trigger false incident escalations.

summary: Price fetch failures zero out holdings
why_it_hurts: Dashboards collapse to $0 without warning, leading to incorrect client briefings.
Teams see divergent layouts when opening the same portfolio on different devices.
Ops staff miss lockouts because the dashboard requires manual reload despite a 15s expectation.
Failing requests flood logs and delay holdings updates for supported symbols.

summary: ROI fallback runs silently after API errors
why_it_hurts: Investors trust stale ROI because the UI never highlights degraded calculations.

summary: Admin tab lacks security event export
why_it_hurts: Compliance cannot produce audit-ready CSVs and risks omissions when copying manually.
Operators miss early warning that nightly pricing failed until downstream endpoints error.
Quant teams lack blended/ex-cash/cash data and must hit APIs manually.
